scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:presets
scripts.build:main:old: webpack --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations --env emitStyles --env emitNonSourceFiles && webpack --env buildType=prod --env emitStyles && rollup -c
scripts.build:i18n:old: webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.js --env buildType=dev && webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.i18n.config.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:i18n && npm run build:themes && npm run build:i18n:presets
scripts.build:themes:old: webpack --config ./webpack.themes.config.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.themes.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.themes.config.js
scripts.build:ui-presets:old: webpack --config ./webpack.ui-presets.config.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.ui-presets.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.ui-presets.config.js
scripts.build:ui-preset-editor: webpack --config ./webpack.ui-preset-editor.config.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.ui-preset-editor.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.ui-preset-editor.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs
scripts.build:presets: npm run build:ui-presets && npm run build:ui-preset-editor
scripts.build:i18n:presets: webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.ui-preset-editor.js --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.i18n.ui-preset-editor.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.i18n.ui-preset-editor.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs
scripts.watch:presets: webpack --config ./webpack.ui-preset-editor.config.js --watch --env buildType=dev --env emitDeclarations && webpack --config ./webpack.ui-preset-editor.config.js --env buildType=prod && rollup -c rollup.ui-preset-editor.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs
scripts.test:postcss: postcss build/survey-creator-core.css --silent  -u postcss-calc -u autoprefixer -u postcss-fail-on-warn -u postcss-import -o survey-creator-core.postcss.css && rimraf survey-creator-core.postcss.css
